legacy.full_text: The 52nd session of the Human Rights Council starts today. China will take an active part in the discussions of all agenda items at this session, work with all parties to advance impartiality, objectivity, non-selectivity and non-politicization at the UNHRC,...

Chinese Foreign Minister Qin Gang attended the high-level segment of the UNHRC via video link today, where he elaborated on China’s vision and measures on human rights and shared China’s proposals for global human rights governance. Read the full speech: https://t.co/t8fju1MdJ4 https://t.co/Ipx6p48vBJ

#GDI On Feb 22, the Academy for International Business Officials, MOFCOM, held the first opening ceremony physically after the pandemic for five seminars on trade promotion, poverty alleviation, e-commerce and other GDI priority topics attended by 194 officials from 27 countries. https://t.co/7KqqnU1r0r

#Climatechange On Feb 21, Xie Zhenhua, China's special envoy on climate change affairs, was awarded the Special Contribution Award for Sustainable Development by the Nobel Foundation for Sustainable Development, for his contribution to climate change and sustainable development. https://t.co/nEMSEmWnRX

#Chinaeconomy According to MOFCOM, in Jan 2023, the paid-in FDI in China reaches 127.69 bn yuan, a year-on-year increase of 14.5% (19.02 bn Dollars, up by 10%). The paid-in FDI for high-tech manufacturing and services increased by 74.5% and 59.6% respectively. https://t.co/Pfsggwgicj

#SpringStories—Sci&Tech. Innovation is enabling technology to achieve more. Chinese scientists develop underwater vehicle which will be applied in geographical exploration, search and rescue missions & engineering inspections. https://t.co/nw0rSyx3QT

#SpringStories—Sci&Tech. Scientific innovation contributes to #HealthForAll. China's first homegrown extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) device, hailed as a “miracle machine”, was launched earlier to provide cardiac&respiratory support outside patients’ body. https://t.co/nnqkygWkyB

#SpringStories—Sci&Tech. AI technology is making a difference to people’s daily life. China’s Internet giant #Baidu will launch an AI chatbot service in March, a modernized communication tool on the way. https://t.co/xw9IP6ikAt

#SpringStories—Sci&Tech. Thanks to Sci&Tech improvements which constitute the primary productive force, the Shenzhou-15 astronauts were able to complete their first spacewalk, lasting for seven hours! The exploration of the unknown is constructive. https://t.co/Vpcu3u1WQD

In the past 2 days, China carried out constructive dialogue with members of CESCR in an open&candid manner. We tried to present, in a comprehensive&in-depth way, the progress made in promoting&protecting ESC rights&plans to move forward. https://t.co/PfbGPcdDJl
I hope my briefing can help you learn more about this review: https://t.co/paHTgjIoJT

#SpringStories—IP. China’s efforts have paid off in enhancing IPR and pursuing innovation-driven development. China will continue to uphold the central role of innovation in the overall modernization drive, sharing China’s IPR and innovation achievements with the world. https://t.co/GeGuPsjwuY

#SpringStories—IP. Bravo ! IP insurance had been promoted in more than 22 provinces in China, providing protection for over 46,000 patents, trademarks, GIs, etc.
https://t.co/1OJwAOmaWN https://t.co/7RU8qdnZgV

#SpringStories—IP. In the process of China’s high-quality opening-up, the power of IP keeps growing. Valid invention patents China granted last year to foreign entities↑4.5% y-o-y, total to 861,000, valid trademarks registered by foreign entities↑5.9% y-o-y, total to 2.03 mn. https://t.co/XP87MQvRZn

In the past 2 days, China carried out constructive dialogue with members of CESCR in an open&candid manner. We tried to present, in a comprehensive&in-depth way, the progress made in promoting&protecting ESC rights&plans to move forward. https://t.co/PfbGPcdDJl

Today, I’m delighted to present China’s 3rd Periodic Report on the implementation of ICESCR.
China actively fulfills obligations stipulated by the  ICESCR, &attends the review in an open&transparent manner.
In the future, China will continue making achievements in these fields. https://t.co/ZS5sA8x4Dl

#TürkiyeSyriaEarthquake China has been actively providing relief to the 2 earthquake-stricken countries. Blankets, tents, ventilators, oxygen generators and food aid from China are being continuously delivered. Rescue teams from China have rescued many survivors in Türkiye. https://t.co/ZK8yY9or1m

#SpringStories—Postal Delivery. Efforts are being made to strengthen network operation guarantees, to replenish the workforce, to ensure the health and safety of delivery workers, all for efficient operation of the postal express network.

#SpringStories—Postal Delivery. A new start for 2023! China will continue to increase package handling efficiency according to the changing epidemic situations, so as to meet the people's needs for delivery services.

#SpringStories—Postal Delivery. Excited to learn that China's express delivery industry handled more than 700 mln parcels during the past Spring Festival holiday, reflecting the continuous and strong recovery of the country's courier services. https://t.co/zbqMucRXzP
